full_summary:
### CSPS Multimedia Content Hosting and Management Solution
#### RFP Number: CSPS-RFP-22JP-1390/A

The Canada School of Public Service (CSPS) is seeking the services of a qualified contractor to provide a comprehensive multimedia content hosting and management solution.

**Key Documents:**

* [Download RFP Document][rfp-english-url]
* [Télécharger le Document de Ligne de Demande][rfp-french-url]

The Services
----------------
The selected contractor will be responsible for providing a multimedia content management system, including live streaming content management services, hosting of video and podcasting content, and related services. As-and-when requested, the contractor will also provide professional services and training services.

**Requirements and Security**

This requirement is subject to various free trade agreements, including the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and others. Please refer to the [bid solicitation document][bid-solicitation-url] for additional information.

**Trade Agreements**

* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

**Locations:**

* National Capital Region (NCR), Ontario, Canada

**Deadline for Submission**

The request for proposal is closed and all submissions have been received.

**Contact Information**

For any questions or inquiries, please contact:
Jean-Pierre Archambault
Email: jean-pierre.archambault@csps-efpc.gc.ca
Phone: 613-793-0364
